{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3495045,"name":"Sai","username":"Hypernova808","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/h/c0e974/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-28T20:43:00.725Z","cooked":"

NOTE: This category is for getting assistance using the forum software, or reporting an issue using the forum software. All other topics should be placed in other appropriate categories.

Hello, we are trying to reset our radio as all the lights are solid and not blinking. Our radio is not connecting to the computer, and we cannot do anything with it. I don’t see a reset button on the radio, is there any way to reset this radio?

Contact support.

This may mean the device is stuck in bootloader and needs remote support, or an RMA to resolve.

NOTE:

Update any additional radios you have to the latest firmware version (1.3.0 as of this posting), which has further memory corruption remediation and other bugfixes and is considered a CRITICAL firmware update.
